mapper.insert: insert into review_reply (rno, no, reply, replyer,user_id) values (seq_review_reply.nextval,#{no}, #{reply},#{replyer},#{user_id})
mapper.update: update review_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
update review set replyCnt = replycnt+1 where no=#{no}
update review set replyCnt = replycnt-1 where no=#{no}
